name: ThemeinWP Import Companion
author: ThemeInWP

sections.description:
The plugin simply store data to import.

Credits

GitHub:
Demo Import Kit require the use of 3rd party (i.e. external) GitHub services to store demo data i.e files with extensions such as .zip, .xml, .json.
Source: https://github.com/about
GitHub Terms of Use: https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/github-terms/github-terms-of-service
GitHub Privacy Policy: https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-privacy-statement

ThemeinWP Import Companion retrieves theme import data remotely from GitHub REST API.
GitHub Repository URL: https://github.com/themeinwp/demo-content/

License

License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

* Navigate to the 'Add New' in the plugins dashboard
* Search for ThemeinWP Import Companion
* Click Install Now
* Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

* Navigate to the 'Add New' in the plugins dashboard
* Navigate to the 'Upload' area
* Select themeinwp-import-companion.zip from your computer
* Click 'Install Now'
* Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

* Download themeinwp-import-companion.zip
* Extract the themeinwp-import-companion directory to your computer
* Upload the themeinwp-import-companion directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
* Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Setting Options

* Setting Page is located as Appearance-> ThemeinWP Import Companion on your Dashboard
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Plugin submitted to http://wordpress.org.

1.0.1

  • Added function for after import.
  • Added demo compatibility for ‘infinity-mag’,’jumla’,’business-startup’,’knight’,’insights’.

1.0.2

  • Added demo compatibility for ‘Dolpa’.

1.0.3 – November 12 2020

  • Added demo compatibility for ‘Ecommerce Prime’.

1.0.4 – November 12 2020

  • Added demo compatibility for ‘Telegram’.

1.0.5 – March 1 2021

  • Added demo compatibility for ‘Mate’.

1.0.7 – Nov 17 2022

  • Filter added for demo import.
  • Repository Id changed.

1.0.8

  • Repository Switch from GitLab to Github.
